other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm, with coved-type ST-segment elevations in leads V1 and V2, consistent with a type 1 Brugada pattern.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The ECG findings prompted ICD placement for primary prevention, although subsequent device interrogations showed no therapies delivered and no recorded arrhythmias.

other_tests.findings: Variant of unknown significance in SCN5A (A109S).
other_tests.changes_over_time: The results were considered uninformative for familial screening.
The procedure was complicated by lead dislodgment and later indicated no arrhythmias although the patient underwent lead replacement.

other_tests.findings: Severe stenosis of the superior vena cava with a large filling defect suggestive of thrombus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient was started on anticoagulation therapy but experienced persistent symptoms before undergoing stenting.
